# Aufgabe 07
## a)
* n ... index
* p, e ... regressors (independent variables)
* s, v, d ... dependent variables

```{r regr_analysis}
df = read.csv("regr.csv")
cor(df)
```
## Interpretation
There is a strong correlation between v & s, d & s, v & d and d & e.
```{r nonlin_multivar_regr}
Regr = lm(df$s~df$p+df$e+I(df$p^2)+I(df$e^2)+I(df$p*df$e)+I(df$p^2*df$e)+I(df$p*df$e^2)-1)
summary(Regr)
```
```{r}
Regr2 = lm(df$s~df$p+I(df$e^2)+I(df$p*df$e)+I(df$p^2*df$e)+I(df$p*df$e^2)-1)
summary(Regr2)
```
